q: coordinator, because he is a defensive guy at heart, and he has that infectious personality- players relate to him," said former Eagles linebacker Ike Reese , who played for Mora with the Falcons from 2005-06. He grew up around an NFL locker room. He has an aggressive approach. He's not an over-blitzer; Jim believes in getting after you with the front four and in strong secondary play. Mora, of course, coached Michael Vick in Atlanta. Last October, he interviewed Michael Vick on behalf of the NFL Network; Michael Vick apologized to Mora for being immature and not being focused on his job when

deep engineering and online experience to help build its presence in the nascent cloud computing market. Riverbed's new operating system optimizes Exchange 2007 and Oracle 11i and offers branch offices virtualized services without additional hardware. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future, said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer , in a statement. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business. Steve Ballmer took the unusual step in January of publicly announcing that he thought Muglia

Allegations loom against reporters, questions remain for former editors like Andy Coulson , while Les Hinton , executive chairman for 12 years until 2007, seemed to be confident hacking was not widespread. Les Hinton told MPs last year: There was never any evidence delivered to me that suggested that the conduct of Clive Goodman spread beyond him. Critical evidence is being extracted from the Metropolitan police. The Met is sitting on notebooks, call records and other information seized from Glenn Mulcaire , the private investigator employed by the News of the World in 2006

Idol, which allows singers 15 to 28 years old, X Factor has no upper age limit, and the judges serve as mentors. Ryan Seacrest says the shows are different enough for both to succeed. Knowing( Idol) needs to reinvent itself, knowing that if they did just phone it in this season and produce just a lackluster champion, you have the strong possibility of X Factor coming in and stealing their thunder and their zeitgeist. I think there's this tremendous pressure to show they're still relevant, says Richard Rushfield, author of the upcoming American Idol: The Untold Story.
